translation.en: Yeah?
Yeah.
On my way.
Seriously? It's a holiday.
translation.ja: 本気で？　今日は祝日よ

translation.en: Bad guys don't take a holiday.
Go back to sleep.
I was hoping we could talk.
Yeah, I gotta go.
So you're still upset?
I'm not upset. I'm just late.
translation.ja: 怒ってないけど 急いでるんだ

translation.en: Call you later?
ELLEN: The Monfell Shipping Center
has been non-operational for the last six months.
translation.ja: モンフェル 配送センターを⸺

translation.en: Since its closure, it's become a favorite location for Sao Paulo Locos to conduct business.
translation.ja: ギャングが 格好のアジトとして使ってる

translation.en: They've come and gone as they please with minimal resistance.
translation.ja: 我がもの顔して のさばってるの

translation.en: That ends today.
Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.ja: 昨夜 ボゴタから 荷が届いたそうよ

translation.en: Due to the amount of chatter, DEA believes this could be their largest shipment of contraband to date.
translation.ja: 麻薬取締局(ＤＥＡ)は 過去最高額の密輸と見てる

translation.en: The source couldn't identify exactly what was coming in.
translation.ja: ただ中身は分かってないの

translation.en: So whether it's money, arms, or the ghost of Pablo Escobar, be ready.
translation.ja: 現金であれ 武器や麻薬であれ⸺

translation.en: Secure the scene, help find the container.
translation.ja: 現場を制圧し 押収して

translation.en: Once you've done that, you all can go enjoy your holiday.
TRAVIS: We're just barbecuing. It's a whole thing.
translation.ja: うちは バーベキューをやるんだ

translation.en: How about you? SOPHIA: I don't have any plans.
You should come over. Yeah?
Yeah. Carley and Becky would love to see you.
Not me. I'm sick to death of you.
Sorry to ruin your holiday.
You ruin every day, El. Why should today be an exception?
translation.ja: 慣れっこだよ エル

translation.en: Don't call me "El."
When did this come down?
Got a call from DEA at 2. Why?
TRAVIS: A little short notice. ELLEN: We've had shorter.
translation.ja: 急だな よくあるわ

translation.en: Yeah.
Don't get that big brain of yours thinking, Travis. It only gets you in trouble.
translation.ja: 考えすぎはミスのもとよ

translation.en: Inspiring as always. ELLEN: And don't fuck up.
translation.ja: 名言だ ミスしないで

translation.en: Let's go.
Ward? Hello?
WARD: What's this? PHOENIX: What we're looking for.
Yeah, it's pretty. BENSON: Hey, Chu.
Why don't you come down to the beach later?
translation.ja: あとでビーチへ来いよ パーティだ

translation.en: I'm having a party. No, I got plans.
translation.ja: あとでビーチへ来いよ パーティだ 先約がある

translation.en: BENSON: It's your loss. PHIL: Benson.
translation.ja: 楽しいのに ベンソン　振られたのさ

translation.en: Why would she go to your party? Aren't you too old for this?
translation.ja: ベンソン　振られたのさ 年寄りは黙れ

translation.en: Just entering my prime. [LAUGHTER]
Yo, I'm not doing anything. How come I didn't get an invite?
translation.ja: 俺は暇だ　誘ってくれよ

translation.en: Remember what happened last time you came?
No. Ask his wife.
All right, simmer down. Simmer down.
translation.ja: もういい　静かにしろ

translation.en: A little calm-before-the-storm levity.
There's not gonna be a storm.
What makes you say that? They've been getting lazy.
translation.ja: そうか？ 敵は油断してる

translation.en: We've been letting them do a few scores, and now they feel safe.
translation.ja: あそこは安全だと 思ってるんだ

translation.en: Well, I guess we got all dolled up for nothing.
TRAVIS [OVER COMM]: I don't give a damn what the DEA says. We go in heavy, stay frosty.
translation.ja: ＤＥＡがどう言おうと 警戒してかかるぞ

translation.en: Watch each other's backs stick to the plan, stay tight.
translation.ja: 互いに援護し合い 作戦どおり動くこと

translation.en: Let's do this.
CHU: Drop the phone and keep your hands where I can see them.
translation.ja: 携帯を捨て 手を上げろ

translation.en: That was sloppy, Chu.
WARD: All, we have guard one on lockdown. Surveillance is ours.
translation.ja: 見張りを確保 敷地を監視する

translation.en: TRAVIS [OVER COMM]: Copy.
WARD: The yard's clear.
We got another guard on the east-side stairwell.
translation.ja: 東の階段に もう１人

translation.en: [GUNS COCKING] CHU: Hands! Now.
MAN: Clear.
Knees.
How many others are there?
No hablo Ingles.
Sophie, anything?
Nothing. This was supposed to be a shipping yard.
translation.ja: 配送センターなのに コンテナひとつない

translation.en: I don't see any containers. TRAVIS: Copy that.
translation.ja: 配送センターなのに コンテナひとつない 了解

translation.en: Come on, do you have to do that?
translation.ja: よせ　必要ないだろ

translation.en: Sorry.
No hablo Ingles.
You sure this is the right place?
This is the place.
Let's go.
Jackpot. Copy. Where are you?
Outside. Northwest side of the warehouse.
Copy. Ward, stay where you are.
translation.ja: 了解 ウォードは監視を 残りはコンテナへ

translation.en: Everyone else, meet at the shipping container.
translation.ja: ウォードは監視を 残りはコンテナへ

translation.en: Copy that.
Look to your left.
Copy. Straight ahead, guys.
translation.ja: 了解 皆 直進だ

translation.en: I've got 10 to 12 hostiles
coming in hot from inside the warehouse.
[GUNFIRE] WARD: Take cover! Take cover!
SOPHIA: Take cover!
Cover me.
You okay? I'm all right.
I got you covered. Go.
translation.ja: ああ　援護するから行け

translation.en: PHIL: Gotta get her out!
Stay down. You're gonna be okay.
Are you hit?
Just got the vest.
Cover. Go, go, go.
Now you're both being sloppy. You owe me a beer.
translation.ja: ２人とも 甘いぞ ビールをおごれ

translation.en: MAN: Let go! Let go! Little help here.
My arm!
My arm! Yard's secure.
What the fuck?
It's a fucking suicide vest.
What are you wearing this for? Go fuck yourself.
translation.ja: なぜ着てる？ うるせえ

translation.en: Inside's secure.
What the fuck?
PHOENIX [ON COMM]: We need an ambulance!
TRAVIS [ON COMM]: I'm on it.
Fuck. Phil.
Phil!
I got Phoenix. Let me see if it went through your vest.
translation.ja: フェニックス 傷を見せて

translation.en: I got you.
"It's not gonna be a storm."
Cover!
Cut him down.
TRAVIS: I don't know why some crazy motherfucker would put on a suicide vest.
translation.ja: なんで自爆ベストを 着てたかは⸺

translation.en: That's not our problem anymore.
All right, fine.
Let go! Let go! My arm! SOPHIA: That's Diego. He won't shut up, and the guy we cut down's not talking.
translation.ja: 彼はディエゴ もう１人は無言のまま

translation.en: What'd Dwyer say?
She's sending a wagon.
What? Why?
She wants us to bring 'em in.
I thought this was DEA. The DEA guys are dead.
translation.ja: ＤＥＡは？ 上官に連絡が取れないらしい

translation.en: She can't get a hold of brass.
translation.ja: 上官に連絡が取れないらしい

translation.en: Fucking Fourth. Until she does, we hang onto 'em.
translation.ja: 祝日だ とりあえず連行する

translation.en: We should keep 'em. Fuck the DEA.
Fuck them all. These assholes killed Phil.
translation.ja: ＤＥＡに渡してたまるか フィルの仇(かたき)を討つんだ

translation.en: They should defer to us. We're bringing 'em in.
translation.ja: フィルの仇(かたき)を討つんだ 身柄は預かる

translation.en: SOPHIA: What a mess.
LARS: Most people are under the impression
that since the Southern states were in favor of slavery,
translation.ja: “奴隷制を 支持した南部が⸺”

translation.en: that they insisted on the Three-Fifths Compromise
translation.ja: “当初の憲法を 支持したはず”と

translation.en: found in Article 1, Section 2 of the Constitution
translation.ja: “当初の憲法を 支持したはず”と 人口の統計上⸺

translation.en: that determined that slaves are only worth three-fifths a person.
translation.ja: 奴隷５人で ３人と数えるってやつだ

translation.en: It was, in fact, the North that did this.
translation.ja: だが実は北部の意見だった

translation.en: The South would have loved to have counted each slave twice,
translation.ja: 各州の下院議員の数は⸺

translation.en: and the North, rightly so,
didn't believe that the slaves that didn't have the right to vote
translation.ja: 北部は “投票権がない奴隷を⸺”

translation.en: should count equally to those that did.
That would've given the South more power to put their influence on the North.
translation.ja: 南部の議員が増えたら 北部には不利だからな

translation.en: And what's your point?
I thought we were chatting.
MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: You've come an awful long way for nothing.
translation.ja: 長旅が無駄になったぞ

translation.en: It's not that far. Who is this?
translation.ja: 長旅でもない　君は誰だ

translation.en: Just listen.
Diego fucked up. He lost Scorpion.
translation.ja: ディエゴが スコーピオンを奪われた

translation.en: And you have him?
MAN [ON SPEAKER]: Not that simple. But I know where he is and how to get him.
translation.ja: 違うが 居場所を知ってるし 取り返せる

translation.en: Fifty million. We both know he's worth 10 times that.
translation.ja: 5000万ドルで売る 本来 この10倍だろ？

translation.en: I don't think this is a game you wanna play.
You don't know who you're dealing...
translation.ja: 誰を相手にしてると… また指示を出す

translation.en: I'll be in touch with instructions.
...with.
Two hundred years ago, it was so much easier to buy a human being.
translation.ja: 200年前は 人身売買も簡単だった

translation.en: Check out his story. If it's true?
translation.ja: ウラを取れ 内容の？

translation.en: It's a fucking Scorpion. I don't wanna lose him.
translation.ja: あのスコーピオンを 今 失うわけにはいかない

translation.en: Not now. Not again.
translation.ja: あのスコーピオンを 今 失うわけにはいかない 二度とな

translation.en: TRAVIS: York.
We're short-handed. Help Sophie process our guests.
Got it, Commander.
My arm! It's fucking broken.
I'll break your other one. Move it.
Move.
I thought I made myself clear.
We got jumped, and not by some--
You say that, and all I hear is you weren't prepared.
What happened? Your team take it easy because it's a holiday?
What was the DEA onto? What do you mean?
Come on, Ellen. This is so fucked. Clearly, they weren't honest with us.
translation.ja: どう考えても何か隠してる

translation.en: All we know is what they told us. They acted on a tip that 500 million in product was moving through Monfell.
translation.ja: “５億ドルの取引があると 情報が入った”と言ってた

translation.en: And what's it turn out to be?
A guy in a box. Protected by heavily armed Sao Paulo Locos soldiers--
translation.ja: 男を監禁したコンテナを ギャングが警護してた

translation.en: Their tip was wrong. What do you want me to say? That doesn't make them fucking liars.
translation.ja: 情報が間違ってただけ ＤＥＡのウソじゃないわ

translation.en: So what do we do now?
I have calls in. No one's around.
Until we get answers, we sit tight.
Fuck that. I'm gonna talk to them.
No, you're not. You're gonna leave them be.
translation.ja: ダメよ　連邦の管轄だもの

translation.en: They're the feds' problem. Jesus Christ.
translation.ja: ダメよ　連邦の管轄だもの フィルが死んだんだ 事情を知りたいだろ？

translation.en: Phil is dead. Don't you wanna know why?
translation.ja: フィルが死んだんだ 事情を知りたいだろ？

translation.en: Right now all I'm thinking about is what I'm gonna tell his family.
translation.ja: 今 考えたいのは 遺族への伝え方よ

translation.en: Elevator to lobby. Fine.
translation.ja: エレベータでロビーへ よし

translation.en: Lobby, please.
[DOOR BUZZES] Watch those sudden stops, boy! Somebody could get hurt.
translation.ja: 急に止めるな 誰かケガするかもしれない

translation.en: It's a big place.
And they've got their Christmas decorations up already.
translation.ja: もうクリスマスの飾り付けか

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas.
Uh, Mr. C, I wasn't...
translation.ja: コヘーゲンさん いらっしゃるとは…

translation.en: Make yourselves at home.
Welcome.
Confound it, somebody better nail that down.
Could take a nasty fall from a loose board.
Oh, I just...
Nicholas. Did you do what I asked?
translation.ja: ニコラス　できたか？

translation.en: Yes, yes. Yes.
I did. Let me just show you.
translation.ja: できました 今 お見せします

translation.en: So I was able to tap into a security camera across from the shipping center.
translation.ja: 監視カメラの映像を 入手しました

translation.en: Where did they take him?
S.W.A.T.'s got him back at their place.
It's their renovated facility in the middle of nowhere. Sounds like the paint isn't even dry yet.
translation.ja: 人里離れた場所にあって 改修されたばかり

translation.en: How do you know?
I heard it on my police scanner.
LARS: Well done, Nicholas.
Now...
Can you trace the number that called this phone? Find out who and where they are?
translation.ja: 発信者の身元と 居場所を調べてくれ

translation.en: I can try. Try hard.
translation.ja: やってみます 突き止めて

translation.en: Of course. No problem.
ELLEN: Melissa, Phil pulled Phoenix out of harm's way just before he got shot.
translation.ja: 奥さん　彼は同僚を救って 撃たれました

translation.en: He was a hero.
You have my word.
Whoever's responsible for this is gonna pay.
translation.ja: 犯人は必ず捕まえると

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: I'm sorry, I can't leave now.
No, I understand. Should I cancel today?
translation.ja: 構わないわ 予定をキャンセルする？

translation.en: No, don't do that.
You okay? Yeah. Yeah.
translation.ja: 君は平気？ ええ　平気よ

translation.en: Travis?
I'm really sorry.
I love you.
It's our turn in the neighborhood to host the holiday barbecue,
translation.ja: バーベキューには 近所の人も来るんだ

translation.en: so Carley's at home making the food for 22 kids and their parents.
translation.ja: カーリーは 子供22人と親用に料理する

translation.en: What's up?
Elson called. Said to come down.
SOPHIA: Carley still mad at you?
She's not mad at me.
Sorry, man, I'm on her side.
What--? There's no side. She's not mad at me.
translation.ja: そもそも ケンカ中じゃないが⸺

translation.en: Besides, you can't be on her side. You're my partner. That's a brotherhood.
translation.ja: 俺の相棒として “兄弟愛”を発揮しろよ

translation.en: Yeah, but Carley's like my sister.
translation.ja: カーリーとは “姉妹愛”があって…

translation.en: Sisterhood trumps brotherhood-- That's bullshit.
translation.ja: カーリーとは “姉妹愛”があって… くだらない

translation.en: Look,
you decided before you got married that you only wanted one kid, right?
translation.ja: “子供は１人でいい”と 言ってた

translation.en: Yeah. That was like 10 years ago.
But out of the blue, you say you want another kid.
Yeah, I said maybe we could think about having another kid,
translation.ja: “考えてみてもいいかも”と 言っただけだ

translation.en: then it became-- You wanna know what she heard?
translation.ja: “考えてみてもいいかも”と 言っただけだ 彼女の耳には⸺

translation.en: You wanna have another baby that she'll have to carry for nine months.
translation.ja: “また９か月 妊婦に”と 聞こえたの

translation.en: She's gonna have to walk away from work after all she's accomplished.
translation.ja: “もう一度 仕事を 離れることになる”

translation.en: She's gonna wake up 10 times a night to feed and change the kid
translation.ja: “オムツもミルクも 妻が担当”とね

translation.en: because you're always off doing this.
She heard all that with "maybe"? Yes.
translation.ja: そんなふうに？ ええ

translation.en: ELSON: I don't know. No, no, no, dude. It just keeps coming up with an error.
translation.ja: よく分からないが エラーが出るんだ

translation.en: I don't know. It's some sort of remote-access bug. Have you ever seen it?
translation.ja: 遠隔操作のバグかも 見たことある？

translation.en: Yeah, I tried that. I tried that.
Oh, are you kidding me?
translation.ja: 本当か？　それ集めてた

translation.en: Yes, I had that in the queue. While we're young.
translation.ja: 本当か？　それ集めてた いいか？

translation.en: I gotta go.
Please don't touch that.
What do you got?
Our friend Diego is a bad, bad dude.
From Honduras, okay?
Joined the Sao Paulo Locos, known as the S.P.L., when he was 6. He's now a friggin' lieutenant.
translation.ja: ６歳でギャングに入り 今じゃ幹部だ

translation.en: Okay. What about our mystery man?
Scorpion? Is that what we're calling him?
translation.ja: スコーピオン？ そう呼ぶのか？

translation.en: Yeah, for now. Nada on him. He's not in any active database.
translation.ja: まあね　警察には 情報の登録がない

translation.en: What about other databases?
Such as?
FBI? CIA? DoD?
I don't have clearance to tap those.
But you could probably do it without clearance, right?
translation.ja: 許可がなくてもできるだろ？

translation.en: Are you asking me or telling me?
There's no way a guy protected by S.P.L.'s best is a ghost.
translation.ja: ギャングに関わる男だ 必ず情報はある

translation.en: Just find out who he is.
translation.ja: ギャングに関わる男だ 必ず情報はある 調べろ

translation.en: You got it, boss.
Hey, put Diego in room one. Get him to talk, have Ward listen in.
translation.ja: ディエゴを尋問して ウォードに聞かせろ

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
I'm gonna go talk to...Scorpion.
translation.ja: スコーピオンを尋問する

translation.en: Dwyer's gonna lose her shit.
Let me worry about Dwyer.
Hey, Diego. We meet again.
translation.ja: ディエゴ　また会ったわね

translation.en: You broke my fucking arm.
I gave you the choice to have your arm broken or not. You chose poorly.
translation.ja: 逃げようとしたせいよ 自業自得だわ

translation.en: Now, explain something to me.
Why would a lieutenant be put on babysitting duty?
Did they demote you, Diego?
Go fuck yourself, puta.
Who's the man in the box? You wanna know who he is?
translation.ja: あの男は何者？ 知りたいか？

translation.en: Es el diablo.
That's who he is. He's the fucking devil!
translation.ja: そうとも　奴は悪魔だ

translation.en: Want something to drink?
You need a medic? It's a holiday, but I could have it arranged.
translation.ja: 医者が必要だな 祝日だが手配できる

translation.en: Am I being charged with a crime?
That depends.
Who are you?
Have you asked Diego who I am?
What's that?
He said that this was going to happen.
Who said--?
He said they'd come and he'd escape.
Who would escape? Diego--
You're all fucking dead. You don't know it.
You tell them I did this, okay?
You tell them I did this.
Hey, stop.
Diego, stop! Help!
I need some help in here!
Perhaps you should attend to that.
SOPHIA: Stop it.
What the fuck happened?
He just impaled himself.
TRAVIS: You're kidding me.
Fuck me.
Who the fuck are you?
You have blood on your hands.
Answer the question.
Did you kill him?
No. He killed himself.
Cracked his skull wide open.
We do not have much time.
I'm not asking again.
What is important is that you listen.
You may think the events of today were in error, but I assure you, my friend, they were not.
translation.ja: 今日の出来事は 作戦ミスのせいじゃない

translation.en: You better start answering my questions.
I have information in my head worth billions of dollars.
translation.ja: 何十億ドルもの情報が 俺の頭に入ってる

translation.en: What kind of information?
The kind that can set the world on fire.
translation.ja: 世界が炎上する情報だ

translation.en: Jesus Christ, enough with the fucking riddles.
translation.ja: 謎かけは いい加減にしろ

translation.en: Fine. Here is the truth.
Very soon, you will be told that officers
translation.ja: じきに ＦＢＩを名乗る者が来て⸺

translation.en: from a federal agency are here to take me into custody.
translation.ja: じきに ＦＢＩを名乗る者が来て⸺ 俺を渡せと言うだろう

translation.en: They are not what they say they are.
Do not let these men take me.
Do this, and I will help you to survive what is coming next.
translation.ja: その後 何か起きても あんたを守ってやる

translation.en: FBI's here for him now. What?
I told you I had calls in. We're handing him over, so we can all go home.
translation.ja: あの男を引き渡して 帰りましょ

translation.en: Did they say who he was? A known terrorist.
translation.ja: 彼は何者だ ＦＢＩが追ってたテロリスト

translation.en: Someone they've been after for a while.
translation.ja: ＦＢＩが追ってたテロリスト

translation.en: Where are they? Lobby.
I'll take care of it.
I'll bring them to him, pass him off.
Gentlemen, you're here for the prisoner.
Commander Hall. I'm Agent Franklin. My partner, Agent Cox.
translation.ja: どうも　フランクリンだ 彼はコックス

translation.en: Sorry for the delay. No problem.
translation.ja: お待たせを いいんだ

translation.en: We appreciate you hanging on to our guy.
Right this way.
That's funny, I thought all you FBI guys used Berettas.
These are our personal weapons.
On the job? It's a holiday.
So what'd this guy do to get on your database, anyway?
translation.ja: なぜ彼は ＦＢＩのデータベースに？

translation.en: Terrorist stuff. Things we're not to discuss.
translation.ja: テロ関連だ 詳細は話せない

translation.en: "Terrorist stuff." What's his name?
Heh. Come on. His name can't be a matter of national security.
translation.ja: 名前を教えても 国に危険はないだろ？

translation.en: Well, look, it's clear you guys aren't FBI, so no fooling.
Who are you?
Just hand the prisoner over.
translation.ja: いいから 奴を引き渡せ

translation.en: Not until I get some answers.
You are dead, motherfucker.
Drop the knife now! Now!
CHU: Hands on your head.
Knees.
You all right, Commander? Prick.
translation.ja: 大丈夫ですか？ クソ野郎

translation.en: Got him? Yeah, we got him.
Commander? Commander!
You trust me now?
CHU: Hooks.
Hands on your head.
Let's go.
You all right, Commander? Yeah, yeah.
WARD: Keep moving.
Keys, cowboy.
I'm going to enjoy watching you die.
Shut the fuck up.
Everything happened the way he said it would.
translation.ja: 彼の“予言”は 当たったし⸺

translation.en: Our mystery man's not even in the FBI's database.
translation.ja: ＦＢＩのデータベースにも 登録されてない

translation.en: Wait. How do you know that?
translation.ja: ＦＢＩのデータベースにも 登録されてない なぜ それを？

translation.en: You hacked the FBI database?
Just a bit.
Look, on the way to the shipping center, I made a crack to Agent Weir about this being the calm before the storm,
translation.ja: “嵐の前の おふざけ”と ＤＥＡの捜査官に言ったら

translation.en: and he said there wasn't gonna be a storm.
I don't think they were expecting any resistance,
translation.ja: 簡単に済むと 思い込んでたんだ

translation.en: which is odd, don't you think? It doesn't matter.
translation.ja: 簡単に済むと 思い込んでたんだ とにかく手順に従って…

translation.en: There is a protocol we need to follow--
translation.ja: とにかく手順に従って… 手順なんかどうでもいい

translation.en: Oh, fuck the protocol, Ellen!
translation.ja: 手順なんかどうでもいい

translation.en: This isn't the end of it.
We lost enough guys today. I don't wanna lose more.
translation.ja: もう仲間を失いたくない

translation.en: You're a cop, right? At least you were before you put the jacket on. What does your gut tell you?
translation.ja: 君も一応 警官だろ 直感は何と言ってる？

translation.en: Let's see what he has to say.
TRAVIS: You know this man?
He actually just tried to kill me to get to you.
translation.ja: 俺を殺して お前を奪おうとした

translation.en: SCORPION: I've never seen him before, but I know more like him will be coming.
translation.ja: 初めて見る顔だ 追っ手は また来る

translation.en: Many more. Why won't you tell us your name?
translation.ja: 山ほどな 名前を教えて

translation.en: That is for your protection. The less you know... TRAVIS: Well...
translation.ja: 知らないほうが身のためだ

translation.en: The ink on your back's not Sao Paulo Locos,
translation.ja: 背中のタトゥーからして⸺

translation.en: nor does it rep any of their rivals, so you're clearly not a part of that game.
translation.ja: 地元のギャングの 一味ではない

translation.en: My guess is you're Special Ops.
translation.ja: 特殊任務に就いてたな？

translation.en: You've been tortured, from the looks of it, more than once.
translation.ja: 何度も拷問された痕がある

translation.en: You could have easily escaped our compound,
translation.ja: ここから 逃げなかったのは⸺

translation.en: but you chose not to. Why?
translation.ja: ここから 逃げなかったのは⸺ 俺たちに守ってほしいからだ

translation.en: You need our protection
translation.ja: 俺たちに守ってほしいからだ

translation.en: because everyone and their mother's coming after you
translation.ja: 大勢に追われてるのは⸺

translation.en: because what you know could cause blowback.
translation.ja: 政府を揺るがす情報を 持ってるからだ

translation.en: It is far more complicated than that.
Fill me in here. What am I missing?
Because I believe you when you say more like him are coming.
But you're gonna have to square-up with me if you want us to do more than just turn you over.
translation.ja: そいつらに 渡されたくなければ全て話せ

translation.en: You were correct about Special Ops,
translation.ja: 特殊任務の件は正解だ

translation.en: but that was only in the beginning.
translation.ja: だが すぐに抜けた

translation.en: I quickly realized that information was true power.
translation.ja: 情報こそ真の力だと 気づいてね

translation.en: So you're a spy.
And I have the goods on everyone.
translation.ja: 大勢の秘密を握ってる

translation.en: What is it?
I traced the cell phone. LARS: Who is it?
translation.ja: 携帯を追跡した 持ち主は？

translation.en: I don't have a "who", but I have where the call originated from.
translation.ja: それは不明ですが 発信元は分かりました

translation.en: Okay. So, what happened? How'd you end up in our cell?
made a mistake in Bogotá.
So why'd they capture you? Why not kill you?
To facilitate my sale.
ELLEN: Bullshit. The S.P.L. knows their lane. They're not dumb enough to trade in that game.
translation.ja: ここのギャングは 人身売買に手は出さない

translation.en: No, but others do.
Who, then? Unsure.
SCORPION: But one thing I am sure of:
translation.ja: だが これは確かだ

translation.en: Someone from your team is involved.
translation.ja: あんたのチームの誰かが 関わってる

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas, who are these people? Show me who we're up against.
translation.ja: ニコラス ＳＷＡＴの情報を出せ

translation.en: Where you going, Travis?
Commander? I'm moving him.
translation.ja: トラヴィス 彼を移送する

translation.en: Where?
Not alone. The team should be in on this.
No. Just me. What, are you crazy?
translation.ja: いや　俺だけで行く

translation.en: That doesn't make any sense. Nothing about today makes sense.
translation.ja: イカれてる　変よ 何もかもがな

translation.en: If I tell you where I'm going,
they could get it out of you. They wouldn't be able to.
translation.ja: 拷問されたら… 耐えてみせる

translation.en: They're coming for him, Sof, and they're not gonna stop.
translation.ja: 敵は 彼を奪うためなら 何でもする

translation.en: I won't let another person I care about die today.
If they know he's here, they could be watching the compound, and--
translation.ja: ここも見張られてたら？

translation.en: I'll have Elson review the area.
Thanks.
I'm moving you.
Moving me will not keep them from coming for me.
translation.ja: 移動しても追っ手は来る

translation.en: No, but it'll keep them from my team,
translation.ja: だがチームは安全になる

translation.en: and that's my priority.
It's how it's gotta be.
Yo, Commander, what's going on?
Hey. Just saw Hall taking Scorpion out.
translation.ja: 隊長が スコーピオンを連れ出した

translation.en: What do you mean, "out"?
It's him.
MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: Listen to me carefully. You don't have much time.
translation.ja: よく聞け　あまり時間がない

translation.en: How we looking?
Yeah, yeah. Everything looks good. No unusual activity.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 不審な動きはない

translation.en: SOPHIA: "Remote access error." What is that?
translation.ja: “遠隔操作 エラー”って？ “遠隔操作 エラー”って？ “遠隔操作エラー”

translation.en: ELSON: That? I don't know.
translation.ja: “遠隔操作エラー” “遠隔操作エラー” 分からないが ずっと出てる

translation.en: That has been bugging me all day.
translation.ja: 分からないが ずっと出てる

translation.en: MAN [ON COMM]: I'm in position.
Did you disable the camera that shows our sniper?
translation.ja: 監視カメラは切ったか？

translation.en: What I did was record footage before he got there, and just have it playing back on a continuous loop.
translation.ja: 狙撃者が映ってない映像を リピートさせてます

translation.en: A simple "yes" would suffice.
Is he clear? Yes.
Think they're watching? They are definitely watching.
translation.ja: 敵は？ 絶対 監視してる

translation.en: Travis, stop!
translation.ja: トラヴィス　待って

translation.en: What are you doing?
You said you didn't want anyone else to die.
translation.ja: もう誰も失いたくない

translation.en: Yeah, and that included you.
I'll radio when I'm safe.
TRAVIS: Let's go.
I was personally put in charge of Glen Damone's protection. Know who that is?
translation.ja: グレン･デモーンの警護も 担当した

translation.en: The mafia accountant.
Trial lasted five months, no less than 20 bounties on his head.
translation.ja: 裁判中 大勢に狙われていたが⸺

translation.en: He never got one scratch under my watch.
Wait. Wasn't he assassinated shortly after the trial?
translation.ja: 裁判の後 すぐ暗殺されなかったか？

translation.en: That was on Witness Protection, not me.
Watch your head.
When they clear the compound, take out the driver.
translation.ja: 敷地の外で ドライバーを殺して

translation.en: If anyone kills Scorpion, they die next.
translation.ja: スコーピオンは生け捕りだ

translation.en: MAN [ON COMM]: Roger that.
MAN: They're leaving the facility.
Take him out.
You'd be wise to take cover. What?
Duck!
Oh, shit. They're under attack.
We gotta go. WARD: Let's move!
Where are you going? To help.
You're not field. Help from here.
Find out where the backup is!
WOMAN: Dispatch. This is Seattle S.W.A.T.
translation.ja: 本部です こちらシアトルＳＷＡＴ 至急 応援を

translation.en: We're under heavy attack and need immediate assistance.
translation.ja: こちらシアトルＳＷＡＴ 至急 応援を

translation.en: WOMAN: Roger that, Seattle S.W.A.T.
Hang tight. Backup's on its way.
translation.ja: すぐ送ります 持ちこたえて

translation.en: SCORPION: Commander?
Go! Go! Go!
I've got the shot.
Not on my shift, motherfucker.
Fuck! Do not let him get away!
translation.ja: クソ！ 奴を逃がすんじゃない！

translation.en: Commander, nice of you to join us.
translation.ja: ホール　ご協力どうも

translation.en: TRAVIS: Son of a bitch.
Back to the compound. Move it. Now!
Holy fuck.
Everyone, inside! Gutierrez, I'm on the move!
Go, go!
Dwyer, shut us down!
I'm on it. Shut us down now!
What part of "we need him alive" do they not understand?
translation.ja: “生け捕り”が 理解できないか？

translation.en: Are those shields?
Well, you have to admire their resilience.
Nicholas,
can you open them?
It's one thing to hack their comms and cameras,
translation.ja: そんなに簡単じゃないです

translation.en: but shields are controlled by the internal mainframe.
It'd need to be taken out before I can do anything.
translation.ja: メインフレームに 侵入しないと

translation.en: LARS: Find a way past those shields. Leave the rest to me. In the meantime, kill the power.
translation.ja: 解除する方法を考えろ まずは電力を切れ

translation.en: Kill everything.
Ready the next wave, and let's see how resilient they truly are.
translation.ja: どれほどしぶといか 試してやる

translation.en: Got that?
TRAVIS: Where's the backup, Elson? What the fuck happened?
translation.ja: 応援はどこだ 一体 どうなってる？

translation.en: Hold up, hold up. What are you doing?
translation.ja: やめろ　何のマネだ

translation.en: I assure you, Inspector, what's out there is far more dangerous to you than me.
translation.ja: 外にいる連中は 俺以上に危険だぞ

translation.en: They're only dangerous to us because of you.
You brought this to our door, all of it, and I can end it right now.
translation.ja: あなたが死ねば 全て終わるの

translation.en: And you think killing me will stop this war?
translation.ja: 俺を殺せば 連中が去ると？

translation.en: Ellen, this isn't who we are.
translation.ja: エレン　俺たちは警官だぞ

translation.en: Now what? What's going on, Elson?
ELSON: Yeah, they cut the comm and power, and judging by the signal on my cell, they're jamming the cell tower too.
translation.ja: 通信と電力を切られた 携帯の電波も妨害されてる

translation.en: Fuck. Any satellite phones on-site?
ELSON: Yeah, none that are working.
Why are cameras working but not Internet or phones?
translation.ja: “非常用回線” “非常用回線” なぜカメラだけ動くの？ なぜカメラだけ動くの？

translation.en: In cases like this, you wanna see. So we put security separate on the internal mainframe.
translation.ja: 非常事態に備えて 別回線を用意してる

translation.en: And they would want to see as well.
They hacked the security cameras.
They can do that? It's not that hard.
translation.ja: 可能なの？ 朝飯前だ

translation.en: For somebody who's good enough, it's not.
TRAVIS: Cut the interior security cameras.
Don't let them see what we're doing.
ELSON: Copy that.
SCORPION: You must get this through your skulls.
translation.ja: “映像信号なし” “映像信号なし” しっかり理解しろ しっかり理解しろ

translation.en: These are professional soldiers.
They will isolate you, intimidate you until they find your weakest link and then exploit it.
translation.ja: あんたらを孤立させ 怯えさせ 弱みを突く

translation.en: I thought you said the phones were out.
They are.
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hello?
Commander Hall?
I'm the man in control of the small army sitting on your doorstep.
translation.ja: 私は 施設の前の“軍”を たばねてる男だ

translation.en: Do you have a moment to chat?
If you want me on speaker, go ahead. I understand. Everyone should hear.
translation.ja: スピーカー通話にしろ 皆 聞きたいはずだ

translation.en: I should've done this earlier.
translation.ja: 最初からこうすれば 話は早かったし⸺

translation.en: It would've saved us all a lot of time, sweat
translation.ja: 最初からこうすれば 話は早かったし⸺ 汗も血も流さずに済んだ

translation.en: and blood.
translation.ja: 汗も血も流さずに済んだ

translation.en: I have your compound surrounded.
Your power, your network,
translation.ja: 施設を取り囲み⸺ 電力や通信は全て遮断した

translation.en: all of your communications are down.
translation.ja: 電力や通信は全て遮断した

translation.en: No one knows that you're in trouble, and no one's coming to help.
translation.ja: 頼みの綱の応援は来ないぞ

translation.en: Your officer spoke to my associate, Simone,
translation.ja: 君の部下が話した相手は シモーンだ

translation.en: not the dispatch operator.
translation.ja: 君の部下が話した相手は シモーンだ 本部じゃない

translation.en: Hello.
The man you pulled out of a box belongs to me.
translation.ja: コンテナの男は 私のものだ

translation.en: Hand him over and I'll go away.
translation.ja: 奴さえ引き渡せば 私は去る

translation.en: Just like that?
Just like that.
translation.ja: そう　あっさりとだ

translation.en: Can't do it.
Scorpion...
I know you're listening.
Tell these people who I am.
His name is Lars Cohagen.
translation.ja: 奴はラーズ･コヘーゲン

translation.en: He runs a private military corporation that specializes in dark ops.
translation.ja: ヤミ任務専門の 民間軍事会社をやってる

translation.en: The kind that overthrow small countries?
translation.ja: 小国のクーデターとか？

translation.en: Some not so small. Hm.
Now that we're all in the know, why don't you come on out and spare the lives of these nice people?
translation.ja: お前さえ手に入れば 善良な人々には何もしない

translation.en: Let them return home and enjoy what's left of the holiday.
translation.ja: 彼らに祝日を楽しませてやれ

translation.en: They could still catch the fireworks.
How many times are we going to go through this?
This is it.
This is our last dance.
I've heard this before.
Commander Hall, the man you're protecting is a consummate liar.
translation.ja: ホール　君が守ってる男は ペテン師だ

translation.en: His skills of deception supersede even mine.
translation.ja: 私以上に 人をだますのがうまい

translation.en: In fact, I will guarantee that he's lying to you right now.
translation.ja: 私以上に 人をだますのがうまい 今 この瞬間も ウソをついてるぞ

translation.en: Has he told you there's one in your organization that's against you?
translation.ja: “チームに裏切り者が”と 言われたろ？

translation.en: Or that he has information that could set the world ablaze?
translation.ja: “世界が炎上する情報を 持ってる”と

translation.en: He's a liar
and a killer and nothing more.
All your problems go away if you just
turn him over.
And I already told you,
I'm not doing that.
Commander, so this stranger's life
translation.ja: ねえ　彼の命は 仲間の命より⸺

translation.en: is more important to you than your team's?
translation.ja: ねえ　彼の命は 仲間の命より⸺ 大切？

translation.en: What about Daniel Chu?
translation.ja: 仲間の家族なら どう？

translation.en: David Jefferson?
Luis and Maria Gutierrez?
Carley and Rebecca?
translation.ja: カーリー　レベッカ

translation.en: Is Scorpion's life worth more to you than their lives?
translation.ja: 家族より スコーピオンが大切？

translation.en: Are all their lives worth Scorpion's to you?
translation.ja: 彼を渡さなきゃ⸺ 家族を殺すわよ

translation.en: Enough. I'm coming out.
translation.ja: もういい　出ていく

translation.en: But before I do,
I want your guarantee.
No harm comes to anyone here, nor their families.
translation.ja: 彼らや 彼らの家族に 手を出すな

translation.en: You have my word.
I will be out in 10 minutes.
You'd better be.
ELSON: Commander, try the phone again. Maybe we have a live line out.
translation.ja: 隊長　今なら 電話が使えるかも

translation.en: TRAVIS: No...
Shit.
TRAVIS: You're not giving yourself up.
I never said I was. I only said I was coming out.
translation.ja: 分かってる 出ていくだけだ

translation.en: You think you can take on this whole army alone?
I work best alone.
With the shields down, this place can withstand a riot. You don't have to go.
translation.ja: 無理に出ていかなくても 中は安全よ

translation.en: WARD: Hold on a second. I'm confused.
translation.ja: 結局 奴を連中に 渡さないのか？

translation.en: You giving yourself up or not? He's not.
translation.ja: 結局 奴を連中に 渡さないのか？ ああ　渡せない

translation.en: We can't let him. HOOKS: Yes, we can.
translation.ja: ああ　渡せない 渡すべきです

translation.en: Did you not see that army out there?
We just lost Phil and Benson.
translation.ja: 奴のせいで仲間が死んだ

translation.en: I don't plan to join them because of this son of a bitch.
translation.ja: その二の舞いはゴメンです

translation.en: You heard him, Commander. He's threatening our families, and there's no backup.
translation.ja: 家族を殺すと言われ 応援も呼べない

translation.en: This guy's a fucking liar. He could be playing us. Let him go.
translation.ja: ウソつきは引き渡そう

translation.en: No. We're not giving in to this Lars asshole.
translation.ja: クソ野郎には渡せない

translation.en: Not after all that's happened. It ain't his fault a lunatic's shooting up the building.
translation.ja: 襲撃されてるのは 彼のせいじゃない

translation.en: Maybe it is. We don't know.
Scorpion could've escaped or killed us several times. He didn't. I believe him.
translation.ja: 私は彼を信じる 一緒に戦ったもの

translation.en: That just might mean that he needed our help to survive. That doesn't disprove what Lars said.
translation.ja: だが ラーズの言葉が ウソとは限らない

translation.en: Believe Lars when he says he will stop at nothing to find a way inside to get me.
translation.ja: 奴は 俺を捕らえるためなら 何でもする

translation.en: If I do not come out now, that army outside, those phony agents,
translation.ja: 外の傭兵や偽ＦＢＩは “氷山の一角”だ

translation.en: they are just the tip of the iceberg.
You're right.
We'll put you by the back door.
Only it won't be you.
Heh. In theory, it should work. I loaded everything you'll need on the laptop. You should be good to go.
translation.ja: 必要なものは ノートパソコンに入れました

translation.en: I wanna thank you for your assistance today, Nicholas.
translation.ja: 今日は ご苦労だった

translation.en: Oh, my pleasure, sir.
Did you know that Scorpion and I used to be partners?
translation.ja: スコーピオンは 元パートナーだ

translation.en: Right. You were saying.
It was great for a while, and then five years ago in Berlin, he betrayed me.
translation.ja: 当初は順調だったが ５年前に裏切られた

translation.en: After all we'd been through.
You know, and I knew it. I knew something was wrong, but I didn't react in time.
translation.ja: だが 変だと感じた時 対処しなかった私も悪い

translation.en: Since then, I've taken greater precaution in my business dealings, because
translation.ja: だから それ以来 さらに用心深くなった

translation.en: no matter how much you think you know someone,
translation.ja: どれほど相手を分かってると 思っても⸺

translation.en: they could stab you in the back.
Do you understand what I'm saying?
Yeah, I think so.
Good.
WARD: All right, let me get this straight.
You wanna raise the door shields and let the army in?
That's your plan? Not let them in.
translation.ja: 敵を中に入れるって？ 違う　おびき寄せて 奇襲をかけるんだ

translation.en: Lure them close, then ambush them. Why won't that work?
translation.ja: 違う　おびき寄せて 奇襲をかけるんだ

translation.en: Because it's batshit crazy.
TRAVIS: We're not turning this man over to mercenaries. Once they're in the courtyard, we've got them trapped.
translation.ja: 彼は渡せない　逆に 連中を袋のネズミにする

translation.en: How do you figure that?
The back door is located in the deepest part of the courtyard.
translation.ja: 裏口は 奥まった場所にあるだろ

translation.en: Here.
Now, about three dozen office windows look down onto it.
translation.ja: 約40個の窓から見下ろせる

translation.en: That's where we'll be. We'll make them think we're handing you over.
translation.ja: 窓際に待機し 彼を渡すと見せかけて⸺

translation.en: To sell it, Elson will figure out a way to open the rear entrance shield.
translation.ja: 裏口のシャッターだけ開ける

translation.en: Now, once they get eyes on the bait, they're gonna move in underneath our hidden positions,
translation.ja: 連中がエサに食いつき 射程圏内に入ってきたら⸺

translation.en: and that's when we hit 'em.
They'll be sitting ducks.
It's the first time the shields have ever been activated.
translation.ja: 建物を封鎖したのは初めてだ

translation.en: I've never done, nor am I even sure that isolated openings will work as you describe them.
translation.ja: シャッターを１つだけ 開けられるか分からない

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you'll figure it out.
translation.ja: そうか　何とかしろ

translation.en: They'll be expecting something like that.
TRAVIS: Well, this is our only option.
They got us boxed in.
translation.ja: 取り囲まれてるし 応援も呼べない

translation.en: We can't call out, and you said it yourself.
translation.ja: 取り囲まれてるし 応援も呼べない 押し入られるのは 時間の問題だ

translation.en: It's only a matter of time till he finds his way in.
translation.ja: 押し入られるのは 時間の問題だ

translation.en: At least this way, it's on our own terms.
translation.ja: せめて主導権を握ろう

translation.en: Look, guys, this isn't an order.
I'm not forcing you into this.
But I, for one, don't wanna sit around and let someone else determine my fate.
translation.ja: だが俺は 誰かに運命を 決められたくない

translation.en: If I'm going out, it's gonna be on my terms, not theirs.
translation.ja: どうせ死ぬなら 自ら仕掛けて死にたいんだ

translation.en: If this is what you want, I will need firepower.
translation.ja: あんたの作戦でいくなら 武器が要る

translation.en: TRAVIS: We've got every weapon known to man. What exactly are you looking for?
translation.ja: 何でもあるぞ どんなのを捜してる？

translation.en: I will know it when I see it. TRAVIS: We aim to please.
translation.ja: 自分で見て決める 好きにしろ

translation.en: TRAVIS: In the meantime, spread out and load up.
Just because I'm browsing don't mean I'm giving up on you.
translation.ja: 一番の相棒は あんただよ

translation.en: What the fuck do you do with that?
You don't want anything to do with that. That's when you got nothing to live for.
translation.ja: 人生に希望が持てない時 使う物だ

translation.en: HOOKS: Hey. Oh, never mind.
What did you find?
Excellent. WARD: Why?
translation.ja: 素晴らしい 無線は使えてる

translation.en: Our regular radios still work.
He may have tapped into those frequencies. He will not be able to do so with this model.
translation.ja: この型なら 盗聴される危険がない

translation.en: Okay. Everyone grab one.
You gotta change.
TRAVIS: How'd you get the name Scorpion, anyway?
translation.ja: “シアトル警察” “シアトル警察” なぜ “スコーピオン”と？

translation.en: I assume that's not on your birth certificate.
translation.ja: “シアトル警察” 出生証明書の名とは 違うだろ？

translation.en: SCORPION: You are assuming I have a birth certificate.
translation.ja: 俺に出生証明書があると？

translation.en: Heh. All right, you're not gonna tell me your name.
At least you can tell me how you know Lars Cohagen.
translation.ja: せめて ラーズとの関係を教えろ

translation.en: We were once partners.
I never said I was a good man, Commander, just good at what I do.
translation.ja: 俺は善人じゃない 腕がいいだけだ

translation.en: You do not know me, Commander. You should not be taking this risk.
translation.ja: 俺のために リスクを負う義理はない

translation.en: Even holiday double-time ain't enough to deal with this shit today.
translation.ja: 休日手当が出ても 割に合わない

translation.en: You know, the job is risk.
translation.ja: 任務にリスクは 付き物だし⸺

translation.en: It's not about or for you. Not any longer.
translation.ja: 今となっては お前のためじゃない

translation.en: Our guys' blood's been spilled today.
Someone's gonna pay for that.
SCORPION: There is one thing you have not addressed.
translation.ja: チームの 裏切り者について⸺

translation.en: The person on the inside who is working against us.
When they attacked the van, they were waiting for us.
translation.ja: 移送の時 襲われたのは⸺

translation.en: Someone told Lars you were taking me from the compound.
translation.ja: 情報が漏れてたからだぞ

translation.en: ELLEN [ON COMM]: Two-minute warning.
Copy that. Everyone get in position.
We go on my call. Copy that.
translation.ja: 俺が合図する 了解

translation.en: Good luck.
Never really believed in luck.
Well, good luck anyway.
Everyone set? Know what they're doing?
ALL: Yes, sir.
Sof, you remember Suffolk, a few years back?
translation.ja: 数年前のサフォークを？

translation.en: Yeah.
That was another supposedly cakewalk mission that turned into a shitshow.
translation.ja: 単純な任務のはずが 結局 大激戦を強いられた

translation.en: What was it, 40 gangbangers against eight S.W.A.T.?
translation.ja: ギャング40人に ＳＷＡＴ８人だ

translation.en: I tell people I never know how we survived that night.
translation.ja: どう生き延びたかって？

translation.en: But I do know...
we're S.W.A.T.
We're the baddest motherfuckers on Earth.
TRAVIS: Let's get in position.
Take care of each other.
The least he could've done was give us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.ja: 彼のマイクロチップを 渡せばいいのに

translation.en: There's no microchip. It's in his head.
translation.ja: 情報は 彼の頭の中だ

translation.en: Hey, make sure we're in position before--
Hey. It's not my first rodeo.
translation.ja: ねえ　新人じゃないのよ

translation.en: Don't fuck up.
How we looking?
When we get the go, I just hit enter, and it'll raise the rear-entrance shield.
translation.ja: 合図でエンターを押せば シャッターが上がる

translation.en: But not the rest of the building?
Right. Just the rear entrance.
In theory.
In theory?
In theory.
MAN 1: Position! Hold that position!
SIMONE: No sign of Scorpion.
Commander, is your team ready?
translation.ja: ホール　準備はいいか？

translation.en: Let's go around the horn.
Hooks, set.
Jefferson, set. York, set.
translation.ja: ジェファソン 完了 ヨーク 完了

translation.en: Gutierrez, set. Chu, set.
translation.ja: ソフィ 完了 チュー 完了

translation.en: Ward, are you in position?
Ward?
Sorry, I was using the wrong mic.
We're all set.
Raise the shield.
Copy.
It worked.
SIMONE: Right on time.
They're opening the shields by the rear entrance. Move in.
translation.ja: 裏口のシャッターが開いたわ 突入よ

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON COMM]: Here they come. Get ready.
SIMONE: Third-floor window.
What is that?
Morse code.
Pull everyone back. It's a trap.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Everyone move back. Now.
translation.ja: ワナよ 全員 今すぐ退却

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. He's stopping. Why is he stopping?
translation.ja: 待て　なんで引き返す？

translation.en: TRAVIS: The fuck just happened?
Everybody fall back to the command center.
ELLEN [ON COMM]: Copy. Everyone fall back.
Fuck.
Elson, close the rear shields. I'm on it.
translation.ja: シャッターを下ろせ やってる

translation.en: Where's everybody else? Ward, I don't know.
translation.ja: ウォードは？ 分からない

translation.en: Scorpion's M.I.A.
Dwyer left a few minutes ago. Where?
translation.ja: エレンも出てった どこへ？

translation.en: We saw a light at the third-floor window
and she just bolted. A flash of light?
translation.ja: ３階の窓が光ったのを見て… 光った？　どこだ

translation.en: Which window? Right there.
translation.ja: 光った？　どこだ これだ

translation.en: Stay here. Keep an eye on everything outside.
Where are you going? Find the big guy.
translation.ja: あなたは？ あとスコーピオンを

translation.en: Scorpion, come in.
Scorpion, do you copy?
Get up.
I'm gonna let you out of here.
You're gonna tell Lars I'm gonna find another way to give him Scorpion.
translation.ja: “スコーピオンは渡す”と ラーズに伝えろ

translation.en: No one else needs to die.
Shit, it was you.
translation.ja: 裏切り者は お前か

translation.en: Yeah, I'll tell him. Lead the way.
translation.ja: 伝えるよ　では行こう

translation.en: WARD: The amount is the same upon delivery. Fifty million. That hasn't changed.
Fifty million's a sweet fucking payday for a cop.
Those DEA assholes are always skimming off the top.
About time I got some. Of course, it is.
translation.ja: ＤＥＡもネコババしてる まあな

translation.en: Hey. This mess is Hall's fault. If he had handed over Scorpion--
translation.ja: 隊長が 奴を渡せばよかったんだ

translation.en: What the hell's the plan on getting me out of here?
We're gonna cut the power to the mainframe. Once the shields are up, Lars can take care of the rest.
translation.ja: メインフレームの電源を 落とし 封鎖を解く

translation.en: Where are the controls? Engineering room.
Thanks.
ELLEN: Ward?
Fuck.
TRAVIS: Ellen.
You all right? Yeah.
It was Ward. I saw him talking to Franklin before Franklin killed him.
translation.ja: 裏切り者は彼よ 偽ＦＢＩと話してた

translation.en: Where'd he go? In there.
Yeah? Ready?
See that?
CHU: What just happened? Security feed's been cut.
translation.ja: 何事？ 監視カメラを切られた

translation.en: We're blind outside now, too. You said the feed was internal.
translation.ja: 監視カメラを切られた 別回線なのに？

translation.en: It is.
Without it, I've lost control of our security system.
translation.ja: システムを乗っ取られた

translation.en: What does that mean?
What I mean is the same crazy fuck that's been attacking us can open our shields,
translation.ja: イカれた連中に 封鎖を解かれても⸺

translation.en: and there is nothing that we can do about it.
translation.ja: こっちは手も足も出ない

translation.en: Closer.
Clear.
What the fuck is happening? The shields are raising.
YORK: Can you stop it? ELSON: No.
translation.ja: 対策は？ “アクセス拒否” “アクセス拒否” “アクセス拒否” ない “アクセス拒否”

translation.en: What do you think he's gonna fucking do, huh?
ELLEN: Travis!
SIMONE: Intel from Berlin.
Dead or alive no longer matters.
I will go in there and fucking kill him myself if I have to!
translation.ja: 今すぐ乗り込んで 必要なら殺してやる

translation.en: Go!
Everyone, move in.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Shoot to kill Scorpion on sight.
translation.ja: スコーピオンを殺して

translation.en: Oh, shit.
Everyone fall back. Let's go. Come on.
TRAVIS: Go, go, go, go, go, go!
Elson, come on.
MAN: After those guys! Let's go!
TRAVIS: Clear!
Move, move, move, move!
YORK: Let's go! Let's go!
Man down!
HOOKS: Jefferson, come on!
Jefferson.
Go!
Later, bitches.
Get over yourself.
Let's go. Go.
Duck.
Oh, you meant that kind of firepower.
translation.ja: いい武器を見つけたな

translation.en: SCORPION: I have something to show you.
The way out.
I found a maintenance tunnel.
TRAVIS: Yeah, it's been sealed.
SCORPION: Not anymore.
Nope. Fuck that. Hey, it's either that,
translation.ja: 僕はイヤだ ここを通るか ハチの巣にされるかよ

translation.en: or you go back out there to face a bunch of badass dudes shooting at you.
translation.ja: ここを通るか ハチの巣にされるかよ

translation.en: All right, give me a boost. Okay.
ELSON: Fuck.
CHU: Right behind you, Elson. ELSON: Okay.
Travis.
I'm going after Dwyer.
No way I'm leaving one of our own behind.
Get 'em to safety, okay?
You don't know how many of them are still up there.
translation.ja: 敵の数も不明だし 彼女は死んだかも

translation.en: Or if she's even alive. I'm gonna be fine.
translation.ja: 敵の数も不明だし 彼女は死んだかも いいから行け

translation.en: Go on. I'm not letting you go alone.
He won't be.
I'll call for backup as soon as I can.
You don't have to do this. I know.
translation.ja: 頼んでない 分かってる

translation.en: You didn't have to come back just for us.
I didn't.
TRAVIS: Looks like everybody cleared out.
SCORPION: Unlikely. Lars would never give up.
translation.ja: いや　ラーズは あきらめる男じゃない

translation.en: At least I got you.
Now let us see if you can finish the job.
What happened? It's over.
Good guys won. Come on.
translation.ja: 正義の勝利さ　立て

translation.en: TRAVIS: We lost York and Jefferson.
translation.ja: ヨークと ジェファソンが…

translation.en: ELLEN: Oh, God, no. TRAVIS: Yeah.
ELLEN: What about Scorpion?
TRAVIS: Yeah, he's still alive... somehow.
translation.ja: 不思議だが まだ生きてる

translation.en: Still no signal? TRAVIS: No.
Gutierrez said she'd call it in when they got out.
translation.ja: ソフィが応援を呼んだはず

translation.en: TRAVIS: Cell towers must still be jammed.
But it shouldn't be too long now,
which means you need to disappear.
I don't know if I have it in me to run anymore.
translation.ja: もう気力が残ってない

translation.en: I am constantly running. That and all the people trying to kill me...
translation.ja: 大勢に命を狙われ ずっと逃げ続けてきた

translation.en: It's exhausting. [CHUCKLES]
You got all that money in your head. Why not just retire?
translation.ja: 引退すれば？ 情報は お金になる

translation.en: That is blood money.
As a matter of fact...
Dude, what the fuck?
Take it.
What the hell is it?
SCORPION: It's what all the fuss is about.
A microchip.
What's in your head. That's clever.
And now it's better in your hands.
translation.ja: あんたに預けるほうが安全だ

translation.en: ELLEN: Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.ja: 昨夜 ボゴタから 荷が届いたそうよ

translation.en: Yeah, what'd he turn out to be? A guy in a box.
translation.ja: 行ってみたら⸺ コンテナに男が

translation.en: ELLEN: The least he could've done was given us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.ja: 彼のマイクロチップを 渡せばいいのに

translation.en: TRAVIS: There's no microchip.
Ellen, what are you doing? It's nothing personal, Travis.
translation.ja: 何のマネだ 悪いわね

translation.en: ELLEN: You should have just handed Scorpion over, Travis.
translation.ja: スコーピオンを渡せば⸺

translation.en: No one was supposed to get hurt. You should've just let it go.
translation.ja: 誰も死なずに済んだのよ

translation.en: Don't.
Don't.
It's over.
Good? Yeah.
SOPHIA: FBI was onto her. And she knew.
I never liked her.
What is that?
A souvenir.
MAN: Excuse me, Commander. Can I ask you to come and identify the body?
translation.ja: 失礼　身元の確認を お願いできますか

translation.en: MAN: Is this the man known as Scorpion?
That's-- That's him.
MAN: Okay. Take him away, guys.
Is there something you wanna tell me?
TRAVIS: Yeah, but for your protection, I'd better not.
translation.ja: ああ　だが 知らないほうが⸺

translation.en: The less you know...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hey, hon.
translation.ja: カーリー　パーティは？

translation.en: How's the party going? CARLEY: Travis, oh, my God.
translation.ja: カーリー　パーティは？ トラヴィス　心配してたのよ

translation.en: I've been worried sick. Are you okay?
translation.ja: トラヴィス　心配してたのよ

translation.en: TRAVIS: Yeah, I'm-- I'm fine. I'm on my way.
translation.ja: 無事だ　家に向かってる

translation.en: I'll tell you about it when I get up there, okay? I love you.
translation.ja: 着いたら話すよ　愛してる

translation.en: CARLEY: Purple. BECKY: P-U-R-P-L-E.
CARLEY: Three. BECKY: One, two, three.
Four. Four.
Hi, Daddy.
Hi, sweetheart. Oh.
You look like you could use a beer.
Or 20.
Hey, what's this? Hey.
Yeah.
TRAVIS: This is enough.
For me.
Just you... and her.
I don't need anything more.
But I'm pregnant.
Are you kidding me? Surprise.
translation.ja: 本当か？ サプライズ

translation.en: TRAVIS: Is that what you were trying to tell me?
Did you know about this?
Yeah, I could tell.
The two of you...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hall here.
MAN [ON PHONE]: Commander, we got a shitshow brewing at the capitol building in downtown Olympia.
translation.ja: 先ほど 州議事堂で 大事件が勃発しました

translation.en: We need you and your team on-scene ASAP.
translation.ja: チームと 直ちに出動してください
